rules_text:
Miracle {1}{U} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
Scry 2, then draw two cards.
flavor_text:
[i]“A machine, a woman and a hairpin have appeared in my visions. I fear I do not know how to decode this.”
—Xiao Hui, Truth Seer[/i]
